name: Panica Mechanica
description:
Side scroller shoot em up action. Use a gatling gun and laser sword to get yelled at by your support team.

I don't watch much anime and it's still too much, help!

WASD to move, JKL to shoot left and right in a faux - twinstick style game.

Have fun.

Made in 72 hours for the Moonmoon 2021 Game Jam
